imdb.title: Watashi ga Motete Dousunda
imdb.plot: When her favorite character dies, Kae suddenly loses weight and gains attention. But she wants these boys to date each other, not her!

episodes.title: Can She Do It? A Real Life Otome Game
episodes.plot: One day, Kae's favorite anime character dies, and she suddenly loses a lot of weight in shock. She becomes a head turning beauty, and because of that, gets asked out on a date by four hot guys from her school.

episodes.title: The Strange Room and the Four High School Boys
episodes.plot: After losing weight, Kae does extremely well in PE class. Seeing that, some girls from the soccer club ask Kae to help in a practice match. Kae has full confidence in her knowledge, but she actually only knows soccer from anime and has never played.

episodes.title: The Clear and Blue Autumn Sky, and Passionate Otome
episodes.plot: For the school cultural festival, Kae's class decides to host a cosplay café. Kae is fired up about designing the costumes not only for her classmates Igarashi and Nanashima, but also for Shinomiya, who's playing the role of a princess for his class.

episodes.title: Christmas in the Holy Land
episodes.plot: With Christmas around the corner, Nanashima suggests everyone have a party. However, Kae says she can't possibly make it because she's going to Comiket. In the end, everyone decides to go to Comiket together, then have a Christmas party afterwards.

episodes.title: Back to My Original Self! What Should I Do?
episodes.plot: The anime Mirage Saga is hosting a Valentine's event, and Kae decides to make chocolate for the event. As Kae fusses over what chocolate to make in order to perfectly capture Shion's beauty, Nishina suggests Kae try making a 3-D chocolate sculpture.

episodes.title: Let the Shipping Wars Begin!
episodes.plot: A new anime, Katchu Ranbu, or Kachu Rabu for short, has started, and it's hugely popular. Both Kae and Nishina are elated about the show, until they find out that they each ship Lord x Akane and Akane x Lord respectively and get into a huge fight.

episodes.title: On a Journey to the Holy Land of Kachu Rabu
episodes.plot: Everyone goes together on a one night trip to attend the death anniversary of Hyakki Sametora, the samurai the lord in Kachu Rabu is modelled after. Both Kae and Nishina are enraptured by the real armor and helmet Akane is modelled after.

episodes.title: I'm at a Disadvantage!
episodes.plot: After the group's pilgrimage is over, Nanashima begins to notice there's been a change in Kae's relationship with others in the group. Nanashima realizes his only advantage is that he looks like Shion, so he decides he needs to be more proactive.

episodes.title: The Beach! Bathing Suits! Time to Get Serious!
episodes.plot: The group goes to Nishina's holiday house by the ocean to swim. Everyone has fun bodyboarding, eating at a beach hut, and playing beach volleyball. But while doing so, Shinomiya realizes just how unreliable he is and loses confidence in himself.

episodes.title: Brother Invasion
episodes.plot: Mutsumi finds a hidden treasure map in the History Club room and invites everyone to go treasure hunting. Everyone is less than thrilled about the idea, but after finding out Kae would be going alone with Mutsumi, they decide to go too.

episodes.title: Forward! Guard the Castle!
episodes.plot: Mutsumi tells his brother Kazuma, "Serinuma-san is my girlfriend." However, Kazuma keeps on pursuing Kae, now with even more gusto. Igarashi, Nanashima, Shinomiya and Nishina all try to band together to get in Kazuma's way.

episodes.title: Kiss Him, Not Me
episodes.plot: The guys decide to all get together and tell Kae how they honestly feel about her along with Mutsumi. Kae decides to go on a date with all of them individually to decide who's feelings she will accept.
